name: Coliseum
storyline:
You have risen through the ranks to becone one of the most respected officers in the Roman army, but such success breed jealousy in others. 
 
The Chief of the Praetorian Guard has accused you of treason, what can you do? Only one option: Climb into your chariot, grab hold of the reins, put your life in the hands of the Gods ant battle for victory in the most dangerous game the Roman Empire has to offer within the Colosseum.
summary:
Chariot racing game. 
 
Racing round the oval track, obstacles must be avoided, while you hack away at other drivers with your axe.
